mono.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: an infectious illness that makes your lymph nodes swell and makes you feel weak and tired for a long time afterwards
mono.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a system of recording or broadcasting sound, in which all the sound comes from only one direction
mono.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: using a system of recording or broadcasting sound, in which all the sound comes from only one direction
mono.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: a monoplane  (=a plane with only one wing on each side)
a monolingual dictionary  (=dealing with only one language)
